appId.description: The unique identifier of the application associated with the campaign data.

appName.description: The name of the application associated with the campaign data.

contentId.description: The unique identifier of the content associated with the campaign.

counters.description: Object containing different counters related to the campaign's performance.

processed.description: Number of emails processed by the campaign.

unsubscribed.description: Number of recipients unsubscribed from the campaign.

statuschange.description: Number of status changes related to the campaign.

mta_dropped.description: Number of emails dropped at the MTA level.

suppressed.description: Number of emails suppressed from sending.

click.description: Number of clicks on the campaign.

forward.description: Number of emails forwarded by recipients.

print.description: Number of emails printed by recipients.

reply.description: Number of replies received to the campaign.

spamreport.description: Number of spam reports received for the campaign.

counters_open.description: Alias for the open counter value.

counters_processed.description: Alias for the processed counter value.

counters_sent.description: Alias for the sent counter value.

counters_deferred.description: Alias for the deferred counter value.

counters_unsubscribed.description: Alias for the unsubscribed counter value.

counters_statuschange.description: Alias for the status change counter value.

counters_bounce.description: Alias for the bounce counter value.

counters_mta_dropped.description: Alias for the MTA dropped counter value.

counters_dropped.description: Alias for the dropped counter value.

counters_suppressed.description: Alias for the suppressed counter value.

counters_click.description: Alias for the click counter value.

counters_delivered.description: Alias for the delivered counter value.

counters_forward.description: Alias for the forward counter value.

counters_print.description: Alias for the print counter value.

counters_reply.description: Alias for the reply counter value.

counters_spamreport.description: Alias for the spam report counter value.

id.description: The unique identifier of the campaign.

lastProcessingFinishedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the last processing of the campaign was finished.

lastProcessingStateChangeAt.description: Timestamp indicating the last state change time of the processing state.

lastProcessingStartedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the last processing of the campaign started.

processingState.description: Current processing state of the campaign.

numIncluded.description: Number of recipients included in the campaign.

numQueued.description: Number of emails queued for sending.

subject.description: The subject line of the campaign.

lastUpdatedTime.description: Timestamp indicating when the campaign data was last updated.
